infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to let user put a photo in his profile page.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: The Beep App uses your location to pick origins, destinations, and predict ride times
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: The Beep App will use your location to provide ETA's to yourself and others
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: The Beep App will use your location to provide ETA's to yourself and others
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: The Beep App will use your location to provide ETA's to yourself and others
